name: Side Salad
description:
Many holidays are centered on families gathering around and sharing in meals.  Family members who have or develop dietary restrictions are often left out of this shared meal experience, resorting to eating alone outside of the gathering, packing their own individual meal, or scraping together a meal of sides.

Side Salad is a mini-game styled cooking simulator that offers simple solutions to the isolation that dietary restrictions can bring during the holidays!

PC build available; to be released via Mobile
